entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
